import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserLogged } from '../Store/UserContextStore' export default function Register() { let navigate = useNavigate() let user = useContext(UserLogged) function setUser(e){ e.preventDefault() user.setName(document.getElementById('name').value) user.setPassword(document.getElementById('password').value) console.log(user.name,user.password) navigatev } return (

Register

{setUser(e)}}> Already have an account?
) }
